metadata.title: CVE-2021-3336 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: DoTls13CertificateVerify in tls13.c in wolfSSL before 4.7.0 does not ceaseprocessing for certain anomalous peer behavior (sending an ED22519, ED448,ECC, or RSA signature without the corresponding certificate). The clientside is affected because man-in-the-middle attackers can impersonate TLS1.3 servers.

criterions.comment: wolfssl package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
